page.title: 08CHRISTIAN BOY:MICHAEL SMITH.
page.content: My name is{Michael}and I am 10 years old.I usually get up at 7.45am.My{ {clothes}are mostly made of cotton, nylon,wool and polyester.I eat cereal for breakfast and leave for school at 8.30am.We are{taught}Maths,English, Science,History,Geography,Art,Craft, Religious Education,and Physical Education.{Schoolfinishes}at 3.30.p.m. When I get home my parents are both out at work,so I wait till they arrive home for my tea.My{favourite foods}are sausages,chicken,fish fingers and chips.{After tea}I play out on my bicycle with my friend,or watch television.There are 4 T.V. channels to choose from.I{go to bed}at between 9.30pm and 10.00pm.
